Perhaps the best film I have seen in a long time  (of this genre). 'Taboo' (Gohatto) was also very good, but I would say  that 'Twilight Samurai' is my favorite samurai film since 'Ran.'
  
  Jonathan

Andrew Schneider <thegreatjahova666@...> wrote:          It's personally one of my favorite movies.
  
  Adam <saintswordsman888@...> wrote:  I'd love to discuss this movie with a pro at japanese 
  swordsmanship...sorry if you already did...but I just love this movie!
